name: Rail Riders
description:
⋆Rail Riders⋆ Ride 'till you finger can't move!

*Get coins to collect various fun characters/trains!
*Avoid obstacles like: oncoming trains, cars and much more!
*Break distance records with people all over the world!

Hope you enjoy this free arcade runner type of game brought to you by GoldenGod Games!
